summary: Completed comprehensive testing of export functionality with page numbers. All backend APIs (PDF/DOCX/EPUB exports) and frontend UI features are working perfectly. PDF export shows proper 2-pass build with accurate page numbers, DOCX has TOC with calculated pages, and frontend export dropdown functions correctly.
passed_tests: PDF export with 2-pass build generates correct page numbers (logs show: {1: 4, 2: 13, 3: 27, 4: 43, etc.})
DOCX export with word count estimation for TOC page numbers works correctly
EPUB export generates valid files with chapter title pages and TOC links
Backend PDF logs confirm 'PDF Pass 1 - Chapter page map' with accurate page tracking
Export dropdown UI displays all three formats: 'PDF (KDP Ready)', 'DOCX', 'EPUB'
PDF export actually works - shows 'Exported as PDF' success notification
Book detail page loads correctly with 16/16 chapters complete status
Chapter expansion shows scrollable content (4643px content in 500px container)
All chapters display with inline image thumbnails
Navigation between Library and book detail pages functions properly
Book ID 5e0285a7-e895-4b5a-8a1a-019662323522 tested successfully with complete chapters
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (6/6 API tests passed), Frontend: 100% (8/8 UI features verified)
